name: Battery percentage
description: This is a small app which places a notification in your statusbar which shows you the actual battery percentage and other usefull infos about your battery. You can also configure an application or shortcut as a quickstart which will be started on pressing the notification. Besides this you can set it to intelligent quickstart. This will replace the quickstart with a shortcut to the wifi settings if your wifi is enabled but not connected to a network or with a shortcut to bluetooth-settings if bluetooth is enbled.  * Batterylevel in Statusbar (in %) * Quickstart for apps * or for shortcuts * intelligent quickstart * start on boot * auto-wifi-off *different themes  Help to translate or improve the language of this app: http://ackuna.de/translate-/batterieanzeige  Participate at the beta here: https://plus.google.com/communities/100825141465511081208 Get a member in this community and follow the link there!  Small, easy, useful! Enjoy :)  Tags: battery, notification, accu, charger, useful, tool, quickstart, wifi settings, status bar
